abilities.name: Stages of Evolution
abilities.effect: As long as Electabuzz is an Evolved Pokémon, damage done by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that has any Special Energy cards attached to it is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Double Shock
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads. If either of the coins is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
